info.name: Cascade King Bed
info.fcomRCopy: Ebb and Flow. With its sleek curved lines and unique modern design elements, the eclectic Atwater King bed has a stunning visual presence that turns the tide in your bedroom. This gorgeous bed is outlined in a serpentine shape and includes a prominent headboard with curved outer frame and low-profile footboard. The overall rich merlot finish over cherry veneers and flared feet add refined and stylish elements. (Mattress set and pillows are not included.)
info.description: Ebb and Flow. With its sleek curved lines and unique modern design elements, the eclectic Cascade King bed has a stunning visual presence that turns the tide in your bedroom. This gorgeous bed is outlined in a serpentine shape and includes a prominent headboard with curved outer frame and low-profile footboard. The overall rich merlot finish over cherry veneers and flared feet add refined and stylish elements. Bed requires use of foundation. (Mattress set and pillows are not included.)
